HotelElement.Name: Chic By Royalton Punta Cana Adults Only

Description.Text: Experience All Exclusive service this Fall with the opening of CHIC All Exclusive Resorts by Royalton. This upscale, all inclusive adults-only resort is on the beautiful white sands of Uvero Alto in Punta Cana, Dominican Republic. CHIC Punta Cana offers a unique experience where day merges into night and guests can enjoy luxurious indulgences around the clock.This swanky, boutique resort boasts 323 luxurious suites all with breathtaking views of the ocean or tropical gardens. All rooms feature modern, stylish dcor and luxurious amenities including the exclusive designer DreamBed, rain showers, 24-hour room service and more.CHIC Punta Cana features an impressive array of amenities including a luxury spa with a wide range of rejuvenating treatments, a state-of-the-art health and fitness complex, and Sports Event Guarantee showing popular North American and international sporting events on modern flat screen televisions. Guests can indulge in culinary decadence at six restaurants ranging from the exotic flavors of Morocco and Peru, to a classic steakhouse.
